languages.text: [Процитировать литанию воина] "Даже еретик или нелюдь может окропить нечестивый клинок кровью врагов. Но истинный воин Человечества разит не ради услады или трофеев. Он бьется, исполняя волю Его, ибо таков его долг. И это есмь благо".

traits.locale_text: [Процитировать литанию воина] "Даже еретик или нелюдь может окропить нечестивый клинок кровью врагов. Но истинный воин Человечества разит не ради услады или трофеев. Он бьется, исполняя волю Его, ибо таков его долг. И это есмь благо".

languages.text: [Recite the warrior's litany] "Even a heretic or a non-human can wet a profane blade in the blood of enemies. But a true warrior of Humanity does not fight for gratification or trophies. He fights to carry out His will, for that is his duty. And it is a blessing."
languages.original_text: [Процитировать литанию воина] "Даже еретик или нелюдь может окропить нечестивый клинок кровью врагов. Но истинный воин Человечества разит не ради услады или трофеев. Он бьется, исполняя волю Его, ибо таков его долг. И это есмь благо".

traits.locale_text: [Recite the litany of war] "Even a heretic or a non-human can wet a profane blade in the blood of enemies. But a true warrior of Humanity does not fight for gratification or trophies. He fights to carry out His will, for that is his duty. And it is a blessing."

[Recite the litany of war] "Even a heretic or a non-human can wet a profane blade in the blood of enemies. But a true warrior of Humanity does not fight for gratification or trophies. He fights to carry out His will, for that is his duty. And it is a blessing."

[Recite the litany of war] "Even a heretic or a non-human can wet a profane blade in the blood of enemies. But a true warrior of Humanity does not fight for gratification or trophies. He fights to carry out His will, for that is his duty. And it is a blessing."

[Recite the warrior's litany] "Even a heretic or a non-human can wet a profane blade in the blood of enemies. But a true warrior of Humanity does not fight for gratification or trophies. He fights to carry out His will, for that is his duty. And it is a blessing."

languages.text: [背诵《战争礼赞》]“即便是异端分子或异形，也会将他们邪恶的刀剑浸淫在敌人的鲜血之中。然而，人类真正的战士，绝不会为了一己私欲或为了战利品而战。他们之所以战斗，是为了履行神皇的意志。这是他们的职责，也是赐予他们的祝福。”
languages.original_text: [Recite the warrior's litany] "Even a heretic or a non-human can wet a profane blade in the blood of enemies. But a true warrior of Humanity does not fight for gratification or trophies. He fights to carry out His will, for that is his duty. And it is a blessing."

traits.locale_text: [背诵《战争礼赞》]“即便是异端分子或异形，也会将他们邪恶的刀剑浸淫在敌人的鲜血之中。然而，人类真正的战士，绝不会为了一己私欲或为了战利品而战。他们之所以战斗，是为了履行神皇的意志。这是他们的职责，也是赐予他们的祝福。”

languages.text: ［戦士の祈りを唱える］「異端者や亜人種であっても、敵の血で冒涜的な刃を濡らすことはできる。しかし、人類の真の戦士は満足感や戦利品のために戦うのではない。彼は皇帝の意志を遂行するという義務のために戦う。そのなんと幸いなることか」
languages.original_text: [Recite the warrior's litany] "Even a heretic or a non-human can wet a profane blade in the blood of enemies. But a true warrior of Humanity does not fight for gratification or trophies. He fights to carry out His will, for that is his duty. And it is a blessing."

traits.locale_text: ［戦士の祈りを唱える］「異端者や亜人種であっても、敵の血で冒涜的な刃を濡らすことはできる。しかし、人類の真の戦士は満足感や戦利品のために戦うのではない。彼は皇帝の意志を遂行するという義務のために戦う。そのなんと幸いなることか」

languages.text: [Recitar la letanía del guerrero] «Incluso un hereje o un no humano puede manchar su hoja blasfema con la sangre de los enemigos. Pero un verdadero guerrero de la Humanidad no lucha por gratificación ni por trofeos. Lucha por la voluntad del Emperador, pues es su deber. Y es una bendición».
languages.original_text: [Recite the warrior's litany] "Even a heretic or a non-human can wet a profane blade in the blood of enemies. But a true warrior of Humanity does not fight for gratification or trophies. He fights to carry out His will, for that is his duty. And it is a blessing."

traits.locale_text: [Recitar la letanía de la guerra] «Incluso un hereje o un no humano puede manchar su hoja blasfema con la sangre de los enemigos. Pero un verdadero guerrero de la Humanidad no lucha por gratificación ni por trofeos. Lucha por la voluntad del Emperador, pues es su deber. Y es una bendición».

languages.text: [Réciter la litanie du guerrier] « Même un hérétique ou un non-humain peut tremper une lame profane dans le sang de ses ennemis, mais un véritable guerrier de l'humanité ne se bat pas pour la gloire ou pour des trophées. Il se bat pour accomplir la volonté de l'Empereur, car tel est son devoir, et c'est une bénédiction. »
languages.original_text: [Recite the warrior's litany] "Even a heretic or a non-human can wet a profane blade in the blood of enemies. But a true warrior of Humanity does not fight for gratification or trophies. He fights to carry out His will, for that is his duty. And it is a blessing."

traits.locale_text: [Réciter la litanie martiale] « Même un hérétique ou un non humain peut tremper une lame profane dans le sang de ses ennemis, mais un véritable guerrier de l'humanité ne se bat pas pour la gloire ou pour des trophées. Il se bat pour accomplir la volonté de l'Empereur, car tel est son devoir, et c'est une bénédiction. »

languages.text: [Die Litanei des Krieges zitieren] "Selbst ein Ketzer oder Nicht-Mensch kann ein gottloses Schwert im Blut der Feinde benetzen. Aber ein wahrer Krieger der Menschheit kämpft nicht für Genugtuung oder Trophäen. Er kämpft für Seinen Willen, denn so lautet seine Pflicht. Und das ist ein Segen."
languages.original_text: [Recite the warrior's litany] "Even a heretic or a non-human can wet a profane blade in the blood of enemies. But a true warrior of Humanity does not fight for gratification or trophies. He fights to carry out His will, for that is his duty. And it is a blessing."

traits.locale_text: [Die Litanei des Krieges zitieren] "Selbst ein Ketzer oder Nicht-Mensch kann ein gottloses Schwert im Blut der Feinde benetzen. Aber ein wahrer Krieger der Menschheit kämpft nicht für Genugtuung oder Trophäen. Er kämpft für Seinen Willen, denn so lautet seine Pflicht. Und das ist ein Segen."

languages.text: [Savaşçının ilahisi oku] "Bir kâfir ya da insan dışı bile dinsiz kılıcını düşmanlarımızın kanına bulayabilir. Ancak insanlığın hakiki savaşçıları, memnuniyet ya da ganimet için savaşmaz. Görevinin buyurduğu üzere İmparator'un iradesini uygulamak için savaşır, bu da onun lütfudur."
languages.original_text: [Recite the warrior's litany] "Even a heretic or a non-human can wet a profane blade in the blood of enemies. But a true warrior of Humanity does not fight for gratification or trophies. He fights to carry out His will, for that is his duty. And it is a blessing."

traits.locale_text: [Savaşçının ilahisi oku] "Bir kâfir ya da bir insan dışı bile dinsiz kılıcını düşmanlarımızın kanına bulayabilir. Ancak insanlığın hakiki bir savaşçısı, memnuniyet ya da ganimet için savaşmaz. Görevinin buyurduğu üzere İmparator'un iradesini uygulamak için savaşır ve bu bir lütuftur."
